title: Season 6
body: Riot i really think that you have messed up in this new season patch, due to poor choices of buffing champions and nurfing them. Please consider the simple act of testing out your ideas and thinking about how the idea will effect the game. I am sure that there will be those who disagree with me and those who agree with me. Obviously I speak for those who agree with me, because I have come across some really really over powered champions this season.

replies.body:
Patch is fine, I'm new to the game and I haven't really come across anything I say is OP.
From what I've heard and seen all they've done is just changed the game up a little and people don't know how to adjust.
I know I'm new to the game and my option input shouldnt be seen as a overall option but it really isn't that bad.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I think the patch is pretty good all around. The buffs to ADC's was a massive improvement, however they could of done better on a couple of the reworks, as adc's all still feel very similar (besides from Graves, i really like his rework. The massive damage up close but no range and has to re-load after 2 shots was just a grate idea. However graves is a little bit on the OP side and now can almost win the laning phase with very little counters). I know a few older players will be a bit disappointed as the game is very different then it was in Session 2.
